name: energy-powder
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP. Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.

flavor_text.black_white: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.
